name: Solar System Simulation (Scott Anderson)
description:
Solar system simulation implementing Keplerian Orbital Mechanics.

Play around with it as much as you want with the provided user interface. Controls are pretty straight forward and outlined within the application, but just in-case:

  • Tab: Enable Cursor/Lock Camera
  • Left Shift: Zoom In
  • Left Ctrl: Zoom Out
  • Mouse: Pan

For a high-quality version & cleaner experience I have included a standalone .exe version which you can download and run on your computer. The web GL builds can sometimes be a bit dody...
